description:
"We`re both going all-out from the start, huh?"
"Of course. After all, we`re here to have a great time with our fans today!"
Gravi and Procella`s joint concert, the FULL MOON FESTIVAL 2020," has finally begun!
Over many days, the members have grown from fledgling idols into Tsukipro`s figurehead units. In order to put on the ultimate performance made possible because of who they are now, with various emotions in their hearts, the curtains open on the stage of their dreams...!
Source: crunchyroll
